v.v: Give thanks to Yahweh because he always does good things for us!
Those whom Yahweh has saved should tell others
He has gathered those of you who were exiled to many lands;
Some of those who returned from those countries wandered in the desert;
They were hungry and thirsty,
When they were in trouble, they called out to Yahweh,
He led them along a straight road where they walked safely
They should praise Yahweh for loving them faithfully
He gives thirsty people plenty of water to drink,
Some of them were in very dark prisons;
They were in prison because they had rebelled against the message of God;
That is why God made them suffer hardships so that they would no longer be proud;
When they were in trouble, they called out to Yahweh,
He broke the chains that were on their hands and feet
He broke down the prison gates that were made of bronze;
Some of them foolishly rebelled against God,
They did not want to eat any food,
When they were in trouble, they called out to Yahweh,
When he commanded that they be healed, they were healed;
They should praise Yahweh for loving them faithfully
They should give offerings to him to show that they are thankful,
Some of them sailed in ships;
As they were sailing, they also saw the miracles that Yahweh performed,
He gave orders to the winds, and they became strong
The ships in which they were sailing were tossed high in the air,
They stumbled about and staggered like drunken men,
When they were in trouble, they called out to Yahweh,
He calmed the storm
They were very glad when it became calm;
They should praise Yahweh for loving them faithfully
They should praise him among the Israelite people when they have gathered together,
Sometimes Yahweh causes rivers to become dry,
Sometimes he causes land that has produced lots of crops to become salty wastelands,
But sometimes he causes pools of water to appear in deserts,
He brings hungry people into that land, to live there and to build cities there.
They plant seeds in their fields,
He blesses the people, and the women give birth to many children,
When the number of people became smaller and they were humiliated by their enemies
Yahweh shows contempt for the leaders who oppress them,
But he rescues poor people from being in misery
People who live rightly see God do these things, and they rejoice;
Those who are wise should think carefully about these things;

v: His faithful love for us lasts forever, as he has promised us!
that he has rescued them from their enemies.
he has gathered you together from the east and the west,
from the north and from the south.
they were lost and had no homes to live in.
and they even collapsed in exhaustion.
and he rescued them from being distressed.
to cities in Canaan where they could live.
and for the wonderful things that he does for people.
and he gives hungry people plenty of good things to eat.
they were prisoners, suffering because of chains fastened to their hands and feet.
they were there because they had despised the advice given by God,
who is greater than all other gods.
when they got into trouble, there was no one who would help them.
and he rescued them from being distressed.
and brought them out of those very dark prisons.
he cut through the prison bars that were made of iron.
They should praise Yahweh for loving them faithfully
and for the wonderful things that he does for people.
so they suffered for their sins.
and they almost died.
and he rescued them from being distressed.
he saved them from dying.
and for the wonderful things that he does for people.
and they should sing joyfully about the miracles that he has performed.
they were selling things in cities far away.
the wonderful things that he did when they were on very deep seas.
and stirred up high waves.
and then they sank into the troughs between the high waves;
then the sailors were terrified at the danger.
and they did not know what to do.
and he rescued them from being distressed.
and he stilled the waves.
and Yahweh brought them safely into a harbor as they wished.
and for the wonderful things that he does for people.
and they should praise him in front of the leaders of the country.
with the result that the land becomes a wilderness,
and springs of water become dry land.
with the result that they do not produce crops.
He does that because the people who live there are very wicked.
and he causes springs to flow in very dry ground.
and they plant grapevines that produce large crops of grapes.
and they have large herds of cattle.
by being oppressed and caused to suffer,
and makes them to wander in a wilderness where there are no roads.
and causes their families to increase in number like flocks of sheep.
wicked people hear about these things, too,
but they have nothing to say against Yahweh in reply.
they should consider all the things that Yahweh has done to show that he faithfully loves them.
